short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Forwards *.btc addresses by looking up the website field of the plebname in the Bitcoin mainchain. Prefix 'https:' to avoid search.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When you input a link ending with '.btc' this extension does a quick lookup in the Bitcoin mainchain via some bitcoin explorers (https://mempool.space/api, https://blockchain.info, https://blockstream.info/ or https://btcscan.org/).

If the name in front of '.btc' is a claimed plebname and has a 'website' field noted in an OP_RETURN of the owner this extension forwards you to that website, otherwise the plebname tool site is displayed.

Tip: Prefix 'https:' to avoid being forwarded to the search engine.
